title: MongoDB Indexes Configuration
description: Schema for defining MongoDB indexes per collection

^[a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*$.description: Collection name and its index definitions

keys.description: Index key specification where field names map to sort direction (asc for ascending, desc for descending)

^[a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_.]*$.description: Sort direction: asc for ascending, desc for descending

unique.description: Whether the index should enforce uniqueness constraint

sparse.description: Whether the index should be sparse (only index documents that have the indexed field)

background.description: Whether the index should be built in the background (deprecated in newer MongoDB versions)

expire_after.description: Specifies a TTL value for a TTL index. Can be a string like '30d', '12h', '5d 6h'
